import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FaThumbsUp, FaThumbsDown } from "react-icons/fa"; import NavBar from "../components/layout/Navbar"; import icecream from "../image/bg.avif"; import "./home.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../components/layout/Footer"; import { BiComment } from "react-icons/bi"; // Import BiComment component import { BiLike, BiDislike } from "react-icons/bi"; const Home = () => { const [likeStatus, setLikeStatus] = useState(null); const [likeNumber, setLikeNumber] = useState(0); // Initialize likeNumber to 0 const [dislikeNumber, setDislikeNumber] = useState(0); // Initialize dislikeNumber to 0 const [CommentNumber, setCommentNumber] = useState(0); // Initialize commentNumber to 0 const categories = [ "all", "ice-cream", "chocolate", "cake", "juice", "sandwich", ]; const posts = [ { title: "Blog Title 1", details: "Blog Details 1", image: icecream, category: "ice-cream", likes: 0, dislikes: 0, comments: 0, }, { title: "Blog Title 2", details: "Blog Details 2", image: icecream, category: "chocolate", likes: 0, dislikes: 0, comments: 0, }, // Add more posts here ]; const [likes, setLikes] = useState(0); const [dislikes, setDislikes] = useState(0); const [category, setCategory] = useState("all"); const handleCategoryClick = (cat) => { setCategory(cat === ""? "" : cat); }; return (

{post.likes}{" "} setLikeStatus((prevStatus) => prevStatus === "like"? null : "like" ) } /> setLikeStatus((prevStatus) => prevStatus === "dislike"? null : "dislike" ) } /> {post.dislikes} setCommentNumber((prevNumber) => prevNumber + 1) } /> {post.comments}

); }; export default Home;
